description: Are you a stormtrooper? That Star Wars character, who has a serious, stoic demeanor and stands on guard at the first sign of trouble. Luckily, Ryan Morris has just the thing to melt your frosty facade: rum!Ryan, general manager of Venkman’s in Atlanta, believes that rum is a perfect drink for anyone who is like a poor stormtrooper on a break.
name: The Frost Awakens

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine all ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine all ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until combined and chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well until combined and chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a collins glass or any tall glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a collins glass or any tall glass.
